thread.title: BRIEF-Meridian Bancorp Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.17

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Meridian Bancorp Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.17
text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Meridian Bancorp Inc:
* MERIDIAN BANCORP, INC. REPORTS NET INCOME FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.17 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.23 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SAYS NET INTEREST INCOME WAS $39.3 MILLION FOR QUARTER , UP $1.3 MILLION OR 3.4%, FROM QUARTER ENDED SEPTEMBER 30, 2017
* NET INTEREST INCOME WAS $39.3 MILLION FOR QUARTER ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017, UP 3.4% FROM QUARTER ENDED SEPTEMBER 30, 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
